plugin.name: pypilot
plugin.author: Sean D'Epagnier
plugin.description: Control the free software autopilot pypilot. See http://pypilot.org for more details. nThe plugin connects to pypilot directly implementing a control interface to configure, ncalibrate and command pypilot from opencpn. For more control and tuning route-following nlogic, consider the autopilot route plugin.
